trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_SEQ_00<tab>The Last Dregs is looking to resolve a fishy situation.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to the all-purpose service unit.

TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the all-purpose service unit.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to the all-purpose service unit.)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> from the Elysian seas.)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the all-purpose service unit.)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>

TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_000<tab>The café is currently experiencing difficulties regarding fish-based foodstuffs. Methods of acquisition remain suboptimal and capable personnel shortages persist. To this end, staff has initiated a cultivation protocol to secure piscatory supply lines.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_001<tab>Testing of various feeds for aquaculture are presently underway. Your assistance is required to seek out additional materials.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_002<tab>When you are prepared, please provide bryophyte samples from the Elysian seas to the all-purpose service unit.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_003<tab>When you are prepared, please provide seaweed samples from the Elysian seas to the all-purpose service unit.

TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_004<tab>When you are prepared, please provide stickleback samples from the Elysian seas to the all-purpose service unit. Purchase of gold salmon roe from unit N-0598 is strongly advised.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_OMICRON04617_000_010<tab>Scanning inventory... <whirr> No aquaculture feed samples detected. Awaiting delivery of acceptable samples.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_OMICRON04617_000_011<tab>Scanning inventory... <whirr> Potential aquaculture feed samples detected. Please insert samples to continue.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_OMICRON04617_000_012<tab>Scanning samples... Nutritional levels acceptable. Please report to Stigma-4 for compensation.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_020<tab>Report from the all-purpose service unit received. Your contributions are greatly appreciated.

TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_021<tab>Extrapolating outcomes based on success of cultivation protocol... Should the café become reliably and adequately stocked with fish-based foodstuffs, Grebuloffs are predicted to experience the highest growth in satisfaction levels.
TEXT_BANOMI111_04617_STIGMA4_000_022<tab>Aquaculture testing will resume shortly. Please stand by and await further instructions.
